# Using No-Code Security for Android & iOS Apps

Last updated November 26, 2025 by Appdome

This Knowledge Base article details how developers can implement no-code security for Android & iOS apps. Appdome is a no-code mobile app security platform designed to add security features to mobile apps.

We hope you find it useful and enjoy using Appdome!

## Step-by-Step Instructions for Using No-Code Security for Android & iOS Apps

The Appdome Mobile Integration Workflow is a proprietary workflow that sits at the core of how Appdome automates mobile integration projects. The Workflow is part of the [Appdome Platform](/how-to/mobile-app-security/no-code-mobile-app-security/what-is-the-appdome-platform/).  It is a stateful process that allows multiple mobile integration projects to be completed in parallel, leveraging a variety of productivity and collaboration tools.  Individuals or teams can use the Appdome Mobile Integration Workflow, allowing organizational audibility, traceability, and accountability in completing mobile integration projects.

Through the Appdome Mobile Integration Workflow, users get one place to create and complete all their mobile integration projects. Through the Mobile Integration Workflow, users can upload any number and type of app, create Fusion Sets, and complete mobile integration projects through five easy-to-follow steps.

![Appdome Workflow](https://www.appdome.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/08/Screenshot-2024-06-13-at-15.35.13.png)

* Step 1: **+Start**, where the user uploads an app binary
* Step 2: **Build**, where the user selects the mobile services and builds them into the uploaded app
* Step 3: **Context**, where the user can customize the app
* Step 4: **Sign**, where the user signs the built app
* Step 5: **Deploy**, where the user downloads the built app and deploys it through industry standard distribution channels
* Step 6: **View**, where the user gets access to integrated dashboards and view usage statistics for his built apps

The entire Appdome No-code Mobile Integration Workflow is unique to each user. This means that the Appdome Platform remembers each user, including what each user performs and where each user leaves off.

The benefit of this aspect of the mobile integration workflow is that users do not need to complete their work in one session.  Instead, users can return to their integration project at any point in the workflow and at any time. This adds tremendous flexibility and convenience to the mobile developer and mobile professional in completing mobile integration projects.

The Mobile Integration Workflow also lets you store and/or retrieve your app binaries directly from Appdome and reset configuration settings on the fly, allowing for fast and efficient app distribution and re-deployment.
